description.oldValue:
,Microsoft Forms will add a new question type - Instant Poll to Polls app in Teams meeting. This feature will help meeting presenters quickly launch a binary poll to collect audience responses on the question without any beforehand preparation.
GA date: November CY2022
Preview date: November CY2022
description.newValue: ,Microsoft Forms will add a new question type - Instant Poll to Polls app in Teams meeting. This feature will help meeting presenters quickly launch a binary poll to collect audience responses on the question without any beforehand preparation.
